body.name: GOTHAM STEEL 12 Inch Frying Pan Skillet, 12 Inch Nonstick Frying Pan Skillet with Ceramic Coating, Non Stick Skillet, Large Skillet with Stay Cool Handle, Healthy, Oven & Dishwasher Safe-Ocean Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery March 2 - 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: EVERYDAY FRYING PAN: Rely on this this frying pan for your everyday cooking needs. Stir fry foods, cook eggs, braise and sear meats, or anything else you’d like while the nonstick coating ensures an easy food release. Throw it in the dishwasher after use for a quick cleanup.

ULTRA NONSTICK: Enjoy effortless cooking and easy cleanups with Gotham Steels Ti – Cerma coating which combines super strong titanium and super slick ceramic for long-lasting nonstick that stands the test of time.

DISHWASHER SAFE: The pan is designed for an effortless wipe down after using and is completely dishwasher safe allowing you to simply throw your cookware and bakeware in the dishwasher after using for a quick and easy cleanup experience.

STOVETOP AND OVEN SAFE: The Gotham Steel pan is compatible with gas, electric, halogen, and ceramic stovetops and is oven rated up to 500 degrees, lids included! (Please note the cookware is not compatible with induction stovetops).
100% HEALTHY & TOXIN FREE: Cook with peace of mind with Gotham Steels PFOA, PFOS, lead, and cadmium-free cookware, designed for a toxin-free and eco-friendly culinary experience.

METAL UTENSIL SAFE: The Gotham Steel nonstick surface is infused with diamond like particles, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use.

EVENLY COOKED FOOD: The nonstick pan is pressed from a solid sheet of aluminum and then spiralized, ensuring there are no dead zones or hot spots, providing deliciously and perfectly cooked foods day in and day out.
10 YEAR GUARANTEE: With Customers in mind, Gotham Steel cookware is constructed to provide years of outstanding use and is backed by a 10-year limited guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Nonstick. Coated three times with our mineral coating for the ultimate nonstick experience – without oil and butter. Food glides around on the pan and nothing sticks, even after years of use. 100% PFOA Free. The healthy mineral nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium, so it will never release toxic fumes, even if it’s accidentally overheated. Metal Utensil Safe. the coating of the pan is infused with diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use Dishwasher Safe. Easy cleanup. Simply wipe down and throw in the dishwasher for the super quick experience.

GOTHAM STEEL NONSTICK CERAMIC COOKWARE COLLECTION ULTIMATE CERAMIC NONSTICK – the Gotham Steel nonstick cooking surface is coated three times and then reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No seasoning or even oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.HEALTHY & NON-TOXIC – the Gotham Steel coating is composed of ceramic and reinforced with titanium, ensuring this frying pan free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for an friendly, healthy experience for your entire familyMETAL UTENSIL SAFE – the coating of the pan is infused with diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick useEFFORTLESS CLEANUP, DISHWASHER SAFE– spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place cookware in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.STOVETOP & OVEN SAFE - compatible with gas, electric, glass cooktops & oven safe up to a sizzling up to 500° Fahrenheit, lids included!STAY COOL HANDLES – the stainless-steel handles are ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties & the unique Y shaped handles let’s heat escape and keeps the handles cool to the touchSOLID ALUMINUM COMPOSITION – stamped from a single sheet of aluminum in a heavy press ensures even heat conductivity and distribution all around with no dead zones or hot spots

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the look of the skillet
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for someone else. She loved it. Said the sized was just right and it was not too heavy, but was substantial enough.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can be used with metal utensils
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful as well as good quality. It matches the two Gotham Steel pots I already had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the looks of it
reviews.reviewText: Got it for a gift...so that's all I know...fast shipping though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Non Stick goes away and NO customer support!!
reviews.reviewText: BEWARE!!! I bought this skillet for the size and non stick option. The non stick went away quickly and EVERYTHING, including hamburger in its grease, bacon, anything, sticks. Even with an insane amount of oil, butter, fat, you name it. It’s been hand washed due to its size.It’s out of the return range (conveniently), so Amazon cust service says to contact the manufacturer. Tried that. Since it was purchased on Amazon and not directly from their website, I’m not getting any help.Buy at your own risk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non Stick Amazing
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this pan. My last pan everything was sticking. It was getting to be so annoying and I bought this on a whim and so glad I did. we have used it for about 10 times and each time it has been easy to clean and non stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Non-Stick surface not long lasting
reviews.reviewText: We had high hopes for this non-stick fry pan but over 12 months in has lost the non-stick function. We have an older electric range with coiled elements and the pan is not a good choice for this stove. The pan does not sit very steady and it does not heat uniformly on the exposed coils.This type of electric coil can produce hot spots and 1 time we overheated the pan enough to produce smoke. After that happened the pan has lost more and more non-stick capability. The pan might be a better option if you cook with a gas stove, but I would not recommend it for an exposed coil electric stove.
